title: Wire HiveMind placement updates to BrainRoot routing tables
description: Add HiveMind-side plumbing to build routing tables for BrainSignalRouter and send SetRoutingTable updates to each BrainRoot when shard placement changes.

title: Feed OutputCoordinator from RegionShard outputs
description: Emit OutputEvent/OutputVectorEvent from RegionShards or BrainSignalRouter and wire them to OutputCoordinator.EmitOutput/EmitOutputVector so external subscribers receive outputs.

title: Expand quantization/packing/invariant test coverage
description: Add Nbn.Tests coverage for quantization encode/decode edge cases, Address32/ShardId32 boundaries, neuron/axon packing limits, and invariant validation (input/output rules, sorted/duplicate axons).
acceptance_criteria: - Tests cover map types (linear/gamma signed/unsigned), center code mapping, and clamp behavior\n- Tests cover record boundaries (max codes, invalid values)\n- Invariant checks for IO restrictions and duplicate/sorted axon lists are exercised

title: Fix Proto.Remote.GrpcNet package reference for Nbn.Runtime.IO
description: Solution build fails because Nbn.Runtime.IO depends on Proto.Remote.GrpcNet >= 1.8.0, which is not available on NuGet (nearest 0.27.1-alpha.0.45). Update package reference or feed so restore succeeds.
close_reason: Added Proto.Remote.GrpcNet package references to runtime projects; restore/build succeeds.

title: Wire HiveMind to IO register/energy updates
description: Have HiveMind send RegisterBrain with input/output widths and artifact refs, plus ApplyTickCost per tick so IO energy enforcement can fire.

title: Add cost accounting + timing metrics for RegionShard TickComputeDone
description: Compute tick costs and timing details in RegionShard and populate TickComputeDone fields (cost breakdown + compute_ms).
acceptance_criteria: TickComputeDone includes meaningful cost breakdowns and compute duration.

title: Implement NBN binary reader/writer + validator
description: Add shared-library readers/writers for .nbn and .nbs (headers, region sections, overlays) plus a validator that enforces stride/checkpoint rules, region spans, axon ordering/dupes, and input/output invariants.
acceptance_criteria: - Public read/write APIs for NbnHeaderV2, region sections, NbsHeaderV2, region state sections, and overlays\n- Validation reports errors for invalid spans/offsets/stride/checkpoints and IO/axon invariants\n- Minimal NBN/NBS vectors roundtrip via the API

title: RegionHost shard spawning registers with HiveMind
description: When RegionHost spawns RegionShard actors, send RegisterShard/UnregisterShard to HiveMind (and/or BrainRoot) so routing tables stay current. Provide HiveMind PID hookup in RegionHost startup or shard creation pipeline.

title: Wire RegionHost startup to spawn RegionShard actors from artifacts
description: Add RegionHost startup wiring to load .nbn/.nbs artifacts, construct RegionShard actors via RegionShardArtifactLoader, and set router/output/tick PIDs.
acceptance_criteria: RegionHost can spawn RegionShard actors from artifact refs and wires real router/output/tick PIDs.

title: Add ArtifactRef and Sha256 hex helpers
description: Provide shared helpers to convert between domain types and protobuf ArtifactRef/Sha256, including optional hex string formatting/parse for display/logging.
acceptance_criteria: - Helpers exist for ArtifactRef and Sha256 (byte[]/ByteString) conversions\n- Optional hex encode/decode utilities (if needed by UI/logging)\n- Tests cover round-trips and invalid inputs

title: Extend HiveMind integration tests for timeout/backpressure
description: Add tests that simulate compute/deliver stalls to verify timeouts, late arrivals, and backpressure adjustments in HiveMind.

title: Add HiveMind integration test harness with dummy shards/routers
description: Create an integration-style test in Nbn.Tests that spins up an ActorSystem with HiveMindActor and dummy shard/router actors to verify compute/deliver barriers, timeouts, and late arrivals are tracked.

title: Wire HiveMind tick barrier to real brain/shard actors
description: Connect HiveMindActor tick loop to real BrainRoot/BrainSignalRouter/RegionShard actors, including registry updates and delivery acks. Add metrics/telemetry hooks for timeouts/late arrivals and integrate reschedule/pause policy with SettingsMonitor/ShardPlacementManager.

title: HiveMind OTLP exporter and telemetry config
description: Add HiveMind OpenTelemetry configuration similar to Observability (env/CLI options, OTLP exporter setup) so new metrics/ActivitySource can be exported.

title: Add HiveMind tick metrics/telemetry (durations, timeouts, late arrivals)
description: Instrument HiveMind tick loop with counters/histograms for compute/deliver durations, timeout counts, and late arrivals. Provide ActivitySource hooks for tick phase spans if appropriate.

title: Define UUID byte order for NBN artifacts
description: The .nbs header stores brain_id_uuid as 16 raw bytes and .proto Uuid uses bytes, but the canonical byte order isn't specified. Current C# IO uses Guid.ToByteArray()/new Guid(bytes), which is little-endian for the first fields. Decide and document the canonical UUID byte order for on-disk/on-wire formats and align IO code + tests accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: - NBNv2_Design.md specifies the UUID byte order for .nbn/.nbs and .proto Uuid bytes\n- NbnBinary read/write (and any other serializers) use the chosen order consistently\n- Tests cover byte-order roundtrips against a fixed UUID example
notes: Specified RFC 4122 byte order for UUID bytes; updated NbnBinary + tests.
